subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: For an event marked by a chronic absence of suspense, this edition provided a radical shift as Alinghi successfully defended the Cup with a thrilling one-second victory over Emirates Team New Zealand.
snippet: For an event marked by a chronic absence of suspense, this edition provided a radical shift as Alinghi successfully defended the Cup with a thrilling one-second victory over Emirates Team New Zealand.
